usRds 0.0.0.9000

Map USRDS data files in the working directory

Source: R/map_USRDS_files.R
map_USRDS_files.Rd

Scans the directory set with set_USRDS_wd() and identifies all relevant CSV and SAS files in standard USRDS subdirectories. The resulting file list is parsed into a structured tibble with file paths, inferred data types, and years.

Usage

map_USRDS_files()

Value

A tibble with columns: file_path, file_root, file_suffix, Year, file_directory

Details

This function populates a global variable .File_List_clean for downstream use in data extraction functions.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
set_USRDS_wd("C:/path/to/usrds")
file_map <- map_USRDS_files()
head(file_map)
} # }
